_sText: A CSS Vehicles test map based on de_jeepathon2k from 1.6 This is ONE OF THE FIRST if not The 1st map with drivable vehicles for CSS !! I will be improving the vehicles and releasing them to the public, also I protected the map so you guys wont decompile it until I IMPROVE THE VEHICLES AND RELEASE THEM To the public :D -Note Vehicles are giltchy so try not to drive to fast or you will kill yourself -To drive the vehicles press the control panel with E and accelerate holding mouse1 and steer with your WASD keys, atix deathrace car shoots with mouse2 after pressing the red button. -Break the 1000hp wall with the deathrace car to bust out :D -Also a shout thanks to Natalya[AF] and the original creator of de_jeepathon2k from 1.6 ~Enjoy Set this command in your server or CFG if you do not want to fall thru the cars: sv_turbophysics 0 haha Good times, I WILL BE UPGRADING THIS MAP TO Version2, please submit random ideas to improve gameplay
